title: Venus in Sagittarius
summary: Affection is adventurous, candid, and future-facing. Connection thrives through exploration, humor, and shared philosophy. The opportunity is to enjoy freedom together while staying truthful about expectations.

meaning.headline: Relating seeks openness, discovery, and honest enthusiasm.

frames.text: Venus in Sagittarius favors spontaneity, travel, and conversations about meaning.
Humor and bluntness can bring people closer when paired with care.
Variety and learning together feel attractive.
Freedom means commitments do not matter.

frictions: Neglecting details like timing or budget
Avoiding emotional depth by staying upbeat
opportunities: Planning an outing or learning experience
Sharing a big idea with someone you trust

do: State what freedom and commitment mean to you.
Confirm logistics before leaping into plans.
Use honesty kindly, not as a weapon.
Invite others on adventures rather than assuming.
Let optimism be paired with backup plans.
avoid: Treating openness as lack of responsibility

reusable_lines.text: Share the adventure-and the expectations that come with it.
Candid warmth goes further when paired with follow-through.

forbidden_claims: Promises of travel or relationship success
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can inspire exploration and honesty
Agency-forward language: you choose how to mix freedom and commitment
Contextual framing: enthusiasm helps when grounded

sources: Venus as relating/values archetype in daily cycles
